scripts.electron:dir: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build.js --dir
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build.js --win
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build.js --mac
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build.js --linux
